Other Information.Additional Info: Preferential adsorption of ethylene over ethane was observed.
Ethane is excluded due to its larger size compared to the pore size of Co-gallate.

Experimental Validation.Method: Single-gas and mixed-gas permeation tests using a homemade Wicke-Kallenbach apparatus
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C2H4 permeance: 193 GPU, C2H4/C2H6 selectivity: 10.3 (single gas); C2H4 permeance: 175 GPU, C2H4/C2H6 selectivity: 9.5 (mixed gas)

Other Information.Additional Info: The membrane thickness is approximately 400 nm. The magnetic field-assisted synthesis promotes nucleation density and controlled growth of MOF grains on the substrate surface.
